### Automatically generated by Yard1's CSV to Ideas generator, originally for TNO

	tno_safety = {
		law = yes
		tno_safety_no_regulations = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_safety_no_regulations"}
			default = yes
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = {
				MONTHLY_POPULATION = -0.10

			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_penal_system_penal_slavery"}

			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_security_data_cohesion"}
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = {
				proportional_gdp_cost = 0.03
				stability_factor = 0.15
				political_power_gain = 0.10
				decryption_factor = 0.05
				encryption_factor = 0.05
				civilian_intel_to_others = 15.0
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = { } #TODO CHANGEME
		}
		tno_security_wire_tapping = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_security_wire_tapping"}
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = {
				proportional_gdp_cost = 0.05
				stability_factor = 0.20
				political_power_gain = 0.15
				decryption_factor = 0.15
				encryption_factor = 0.15
				civilian_intel_to_others = 10.0
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = { } #TODO CHANGEME
		}
		tno_security_preemptive_security = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_security_preemptive_security"}
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = {
				proportional_gdp_cost = 0.09
				stability_factor = 0.25
				political_power_gain = 0.20
				decryption_factor = 0.25
				encryption_factor = 0.25
				civilian_intel_to_others = 5.0
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = { } #TODO CHANGEME
		}
	}
}
